desc: The biggest asset of this hotel is its staff. It’s in a great location with excellent transport links and close to Chinatown with its many restaurants, food courts and markets. It can be a little noisy on Friday and Saturday nights due to its proximity to Club Street, but only until about midnight. The staff really make the place though and are very professional and friendly. We were particularly impressed with Joscelyn, one of the reception staff, who really went out of her way to ensure we wanted for nothing during our stay.

title: Great boutique hotel with a cool classy feel
desc: I travel a lot with business and very occasionally you find a hotel that feels like you are coming home this is it! Special call-out for Jocelyn on reception, incredible service and support! Good location, very close to Maxwell food court. Traditional building nice boutique hotel with a classy service. Cool roof bar, excellent coffee shop / keto and pizza menu (not part of the hotel).

title: Lovely setting warm welcome
desc: Room was comfortable, especially nice shower room. Advice from receptionists was excellent. The local food hall covered every taste, close to tube (Maxwell) and in China Town. Our first visit to Singapore and this was a lovely discovery. The decor in the lobby and throughout is a nice fusion of old and new.

title: Amazing staff - hotel less so
desc: Location in Chinatown is excellent and easy to get to other locations on foot or public transport. However, we upgraded our room after we found our Deluxe room to be way too small for an 8 night stay. Even then, there were some odd things. I understand that hotels need to maximise use of space but, couldn't open shower door completely as it hit the toilet. AND the "3" rating is NOT a reflection on the staff. They deserve a 5. Housekeeping and desk staff were amazingly helpful especially Vino, Hari & Joscelyn. Disappointed that ongoing renovations meant there was no Jacuzzi, or Rooftop bar. It would help if a list of available facilities was provided in each room. Felt that Laundry & dry cleaning on offer excessively expensive so chose to use local laundromat. BTW

title: Beautiful, boutique hotel right in the middle of Chinatown. Staff could not be more helpful. Loved staying there.
desc: We stayed at The Scarlet on our way back to Australia. Exceptionally beautiful little boutique hotel with wonderful staff. The decor is very different from the usual ‘cookie cutter’ hotel chains and we loved it. Comfortable, large rooms (each one has a different theme) and the mini bar is all included in the room price! Even though it is right in the middle of Chinatown the rooms are exceptionally quite. Just what we needed after a 14 hour flight from London. The staff could not have been more helpful. Treated us like real human beings and not just bodies that need a bed which has been our experience with the multi national chains we have stayed in. Cannot recommend The Scarlet highly enough. If you are ever in Singapore this is the place to stay!

title: highly recommended
desc: front desk staff provided excellent service, special compliments to Ms Nabila who was warm and sincere in attending to hotel guests. room was comfortable and clean. location is great, with access to wide variety of cuisines in near proximity. this hotel is like a little gem in the heart of the city.

title: Singapore China Town
desc: The hotel is great as its a black from China Town and The Buddha tooth temple, and two MRT statik s one 50 m away The other about 400m. Staffare great friendly helpful and great at suggestions and options too. The front dest staff are great as are The rest of The team. Great roof bar and restaurant on The ground floor on Ann Siang street, which leads over the Hill to several vist ros and fashinable bars and its less than ten min walk unless you want street food at Maxwell food hall about 59 m from the hotel. China Town is also full of great places to eat and try different Styles. The room are great conformable beds and bathroom with great mini bar included. Top room have special feathures which did not try, maybe next time.

title: Great Staff - Shame About The Hotel..
desc: Scarlet by name, and scarlet by nature; entering the foyer a couple of weeks before Christmas was like Santa’s Grotto on acid - they couldn’t have crammed more ‘red’ in there if they’d tried, making sunglasses almost obligatory… Much has already been said about the hotel’s general condition - particularly carpets - and it’s all true; red does not take kindly to wear and tear. It’s also weird to stay in a room without a window but the air on was on top form, working quietly and methodically throughout, so fresh air was not missed. Also previous reviews have covered the hotel’s location, which is great if walking is your thing; Maxwell over the road, Ann Siang up (and down) the hill, and Chinatown on the doorstep - even Lau Pa Sat is doable at 800m. We didn’t try the in

title: A tired hotel with great staff
desc: Positives: 1)The staff were excellent and worked very hard - going above and beyond with every request. We arrived early morning after a long flight expecting to store baggage until check in time but we were able to access our room straight away and enjoy a hot shower and a sleep. 2)The location is very convenient - only a 90 second walk to MRT Maxwell for public transport and the Maxwell Hawker Market for a great, cheap meal. 5 minute walk in one direction to the lively restaurant area of Ann Siang Road and 5minutes the other way to the markets and restaurants of Smith, Temple and Mosque Streets. 3)The air-conditioning in the room was excellent! 4)The wifi had good upload speed. 5)The minibar was free and restocked daily ... including a couple of refreshing Tiger beers:)

title: Amazing service, felt really comfortable!
desc: I felt comfortable at The Scarlet Singapore from the very first moment. The service personnel was fantastic and took care of my needs every second. Even though check-out was at 12.00, I could use their facilities (shower, meeting room) until late at night since my flight was pretty late. Besides, the location is great, lots of restaurants and cafés are nearby as well as a metro station. Can only recommend this hotel!

title: Birthday Shock
desc: I really love this hotel . The room is so nice , different design for every room . Ya i have been here many time. The service here is out of the box. I am always serve by the handsome Faizz . This boy will always take care of me when i come. It was my boyfriend birthday on one of the days were staying and i did not tell the front desk about it . I went out with my boyfriend and when i come back the room was clean and Faizz gave my boyfriend a bottle of red wine and a birthday card . So Sweet. Anyway this hotel got free tiger beer daily and chocolate too. I will come back soon . Thank you ya and see you soon!

title: Scarlet Fever
desc: Let me begin by saying my flight arrived in Singapore at 1.30am, I arrived at the Scarlet at 2.30am where I was greeted by PUVAN` ARJUNAN the night manager, this man was so friendly, offered me coffee and water the minute I walked through the door, throughout my 2 night stay this man could not do enough for you, He is an asset to this hotel. The hotel is very well located, with Chinatown at the end of the street, also located at the end of the street is the MRT station where you can buy a tourist pass and travel anywhere in the city. Overall, this was my first trip to Singapore and definitely not my last, same goes for The Scarlet Hotel.

title: Chinatown "shophouse"
desc: I've been to Singapore many time but never stayed in Chinatown. This was a one night transit so a great opportunity to try. We chose this hotel and what a great location. In a very cute shophouse, just near the "Buddha Tooth Temple' and a stroll to 2 Hawker centers. The room was small but ok, nice bathroom and the hotel has a restaurant which has a Keto menu !! I had no idea, but was delighted as that is exactly my diet right now.

title: Wonderful stay at The Scarlet. It will not disappoint.
desc: A real feeling of being in a historically significant building in Singapore in the heart of Chinatown very near the renowned Maxwell Food Centre. Genuinely good hawker food. Chicken Rice is great. A hotel with a very individual character and charm. An enormous thank you to ALL of the staff who engaged with us professionally and politely but in a way that made us feel that they were interested in listening to us. Nothing was too much trouble. Very comfortable beds and peaceful atmosphere made for restful sleep. No banging of doors, loud voices or corridor noises to be heard at the Scarlet. Rooms kept very clean by housekeeping who were always on hand and unfailingly helpful and immediately responsive. The parade of shops attached to the Scarlet are of added interest. We

title: Fabulous hotel
desc: Beautifully restored hotel with modern amenities. Staff well trained and friendly. Situated close to china town and nearby mrt station. Good value for money would highly recommend to anyone. Marilyn,Canberra,Australia

title: Passion
desc: It was very last min plan for me and my friends wanted to book a hotel for the count down and we came across The Scarlet Hotel. Faizz was kind enough to give me a tour to the room that are best for me and my friends. He was very professional and brought along the housemaid manager , I think it was Sabana who help to explained the setting of the room and if extra bed can be put in. The Room was AMAZING!!! There are private jacuzzi at our terrace that can fit 3 pax at a time. Room came with complimentary bottle or red wine , white wine and sparkling wine + 2 beers and many more ! Service was SUPERED! We requested for like 3 bath robe and glasses , it came in very fast and they are always smiling , really make us feel welcome. Thank you Faizz for hosting us. I will be

title: A reason to come back to Singapore. Very central tooooo. Direct metro to the Bay
desc: Clean room, complete inventory, great admosfere, very very friendly staff. Thank you Jocelyn, Faizz and colleagues for all your services!! Calling the cab and taking care of the luggages. Love you and when in Sing will definitely come back to your lovely Scarlett hotel!!!

title: Great Find.....Great Staff
desc: Had one night stay here both at the start and the end of our long holiday. It is conveniently located in the Chinatown area. Room was lovely (we were given the same room for both stays). Bed extremely large and very comfortable. Room had everything we needed... with the bonus of a complimentary mini bar. We couldn't praise the staff highly enough....especially Joscelyn on our first stay. Friendly and very helpful. They welcomed us with a free bottle of water and held our bags for us after checkout until we were ready to leave. This hotel was a great find and we would have no hesitation in booking again if we ever return to Singapore.

title: Ms
desc: A wonderful place to stay in the heart of Singapore in the Chinatown district. The hotel customer service is superb and there are some great bars and restaurants close by, We would thoroughly recommend!

title: Excellent service
desc: My wife and I came for our staycation and absolutely had a great time. The whole vibe and set up is great. However, Faizz and Ayub deserve special mention as they certainly go about catering to guests’ requests with always a smile on their face. Certainly deserve to be recognised and rewarded.

title: Make sure you book a room with a window or skylight and check this when you arrive
desc: Booked a Deluxe Room, booking confirmation says "Deluxe Rooms are available with a choice of windows or skylight. Enjoy a morning greeting of gentle sunray, or an evening gazing out to a starlit sky". We arrived in the evening, and were allocated room 38. We unpacked and it looked as though there was a window behind the bed, but morning revealed this was just a headboard screwed to the wall. In fact there was no window or skylight, not even a window to an interior part of the hotel. We should have complained at reception, but we had had a long flight, and couldn't face packing up again and moving rooms. We should have complained, as we found the room increasingly claustrophobic as time went on. Pluses: We liked the location. The staff were pleasant and helpful. The lady at

title: Poor
desc: Hugely overpriced …. Tiny room …. poor breakfast …awful coffee Not a great experience for well over $400 per night .. location is good but that is not enough to bring me back… room was just big enough to fit the standard double bed .. no room for luggage … i booked balcony room and balcony looked directly at multi storey car park ..

title: Great hotel at a steal!
desc: Great front office crew. Room is great with complementary mini bar facilities. For the price vs comfort, it’s a great option especially with expensive hotel prices in sg cbd. Location wise - it’s walking distance to China town, MRT, food courtyard, great dining options. Just make sure to ask for a room with window if you’re claustrophobic!

title: Great stay, adorable staff
desc: My and my boyfriend just spent one night in this hotel to make a stop of our very long journey traveling (leaving Paris to reach Australia). We were very jetlag, exhausted and having a so caring staff was the best we could hope. Special mention to Jocelyne who take care of us most of the time and was so lovely with us. She did her best for us to early check-in because our plane land pretty early and the hotel keep our luggages the day after and even offer us to take shower before taking our plane after we checked out. It was a relief for us so thanks again. On the side, the bedroom and everything was perfect, the mattress was amazing. I highly recommend this place :)

title: Central China town
desc: Love this hotel. Pleasant room clean with refreshments and the essential teas/coffee. Staff are lovely and very friendly. Deffinately would come back here again. It so essential to China town and foods market opposit the hotel. 30 min walk to marina bay.

title: Nice city hotel with lovely staff!
desc: Great small hotel in the middle of Singapore. Very clean rooms. Hotel staff was extremely lovely and helpful. I can definitely recommend the hotel to everyone who is looking for a nice city hotel near Chinatown, Outram Park and Downtown Singapore!

title: Ideally located with great service
desc: Conveniently located and very reasonably priced hotel right in the heart of Singapore. Only seconds away from the Maxwell food centre, MTR, and the bars and restaurants of Chinatown. The room was well equipped - an iron brought to me in minutes on request, spacious bathroom, free minibar (beers, soft drinks, chocolate) and comfy bed. Best thing though is the service; Faizz was on hand to help throughout my stay - thank you - I’ll be back!

title: Wonderful week-long stay in fantastic hotel.
desc: This historic hotel has been completely renovated and provides one of the best stays I have experienced in my travels. Large, quiet and comfortable. The room was large, the bed fantastic (!) and had the best rain shower I've ever experienced. One block from Soba St and the beginning of the Chinatown adventure. The hotel restaurant has excellent meals, although unbelievably expensive! Breakfast routinely topped $80 U.S., dinner $120. The staff was professional, friendly and very helpful. I will definitely stay there again, but eat elsewhere. The room had a very large screen TV, a well-stocked minibar and a kettle for coffee. the only windows were high on the wall and did not provide easy egress. Overall evaluation: Excellent value for the money.

title: One night stay
desc: Was served by Fai throughout our one night stay. Place was easy to find & the room was amazing. Definitely coming back especially having the staff served us v welcoming! The beverage on the room was also complimentary wow

title: Short stay in Singapore
desc: We stayed at The Scarlet Singapore for four nights and five days. We were in Singapore for a short holiday, and it was made all the better by the warm, friendly, and helpful staff at The Scarlet Singapore. The hotel is located near many restaurants and shops, and is short walk to Chinatown and the MRT. We will be staying here again!

title: Wonderful staff at the Scarlet, a quirky and comfortable hotel
desc: Exceptionally excellent service - I was so impressed with the complimentary minibar and how the staff, especially Faizz at the front desk, went the extra mile. Lovely to stay so centrally in Chinatown so close to my favourite Hawker centres but also super convenient in terms of public transport links. Quirky yet considered hotel design. The staff made it a wonderful stay, and they seemed pleased to help with booking taxis, loaning umbrellas, giving recommendations etc. Will definitely be back. Thank you!

title: Amazing Stay at Scarlet Hotel
desc: We really enjoyed our a one night staycation at Scarlet, to celebrate my partner's birthday. It is conveniently located near Maxwell Mrt. We were amazed with the hospitality and friendliness of Faizz and his team of front desk receptionist staffs that would go out of their way to ensure their guest's needs are well met and their guest are well taken care off, even their room attendents were very welcoming and friendly! Hotel staffs are really key to make one stay feels like home. We were staying in the Lavish room which had very beautiful interior design and was very spacious and clean, with 100% blackout curtains and a very huge tv with netflix included. Plus points, the bathroom was fantastic, with both standing shower and a private bathtub/jacuzzi and bath salts provided.

title: A Shining Gem of a Boutique hotel in Central Singapore
desc: Decided on a spontaneous solo staycation and stumbled upon this gem of a boutique hotel. Was booked into one of their themed suites and it was truly a memorable experience. The room was clean, cosy, and came fitted with unique decor and furnishings that is definitely unlike any other hotel I've stayed before. There are attached balconies for some of the suite rooms, and I was thankful to be assigned one with. To top it off, the room comes with a fully stock bar with drinks and wines. These are replenished everyday and the spacious living area makes it suitable for a cosy gathering for any occasion. All the staff were super friendly and passionate and really helped make my stay even more pleasant. Special shout out goes to 1) Nabila, who helped me out with patience and

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: We had just one night stay at the Scarlet, but wished we could of stayed for longer! The hotel itself is beautiful, set in an ideal location and furnished to perfection inside. It felt extremely clean and well looked after, the sheets were fresh and the bed was very comfortable! The bathroom was very spacious with nice fresh towel and a very powerful shower. The mini bar had everything that we could of wanted and more!! A special mention has to go to the staff at the hotel - from the minute we walked into the beautiful lobbed we were greeted by the lovely smiley Faizz and Ayub. I can’t give these lovely men enough credit. They were extremely friendly, knowledgable of the area and made us feel very at home and welcome during our stay!

title: Comfortable & relaxing
desc: Stayed at The Opulent' suite room. It's very spacious, seperated living area & bedroom. And both areas are equipped with TV. So you could either Netflix in the living area or in the bedroom, which is cool feature. There's also a huge balcony, perfect for chilling out or doing your work while enjoying the morning breeze. The bed, couch and pillows are all very comfortable to use. The toilet is equipped with both standing shower and a tub. Would definitely come back to stay here. Good job Scarlet!!

title: Great for a city trip
desc: Beautiful boutique hotel with a great location right in The centre of Chinatown. The room was clean and big The staff was fantastic and very helpful, with any questions I had Also a very nice rooftop bar, this hotel is a real gem :) Would absolutely recommend and stay again!

title: One health conference
desc: I absolutely loved staying here. Complimentary drinks omg the staff just everyone 😍😍😍😍was so kind and friendly. I’m definitely bringing my whole family here next year,and it’s closer to most fun areas

title: Solo Business Traveler
desc: Great location! Less than 10 minutes from an MRT and within walking distance to high end restaurants and Maxwell Hawker Center. Incredibly friendly staff, who were always helpful and remembered my name. Rooftop bar was nice for winding down.

title: Must try!
desc: Good facilities and environment. There’s like bathtub, cafes and all. Staff was also friendly and gave us a room upgrade upon hearing that this hotel reservation is for my girlfriend’s birthday. Will definitely be back!!!

title: Thank you Faizz and Joscelyn ❤️
desc: It was an amazing 3 nights , clean hotel, very good location, And the most important thing the staff are really nice, professional and kind Thank you Faizz and Joscelyn for making this experience awesome and thank you for your hospitality. You are really awesome guyssssss ❤️❤️

title: Simply The Best Hotel In Singapore
desc: By far, the best hotel I’ve stayed in here in Singapore. The staff from the front desk through to the housekeeping team are not only extremely courteous, they’re very warm, welcoming, professional and hard working as well. They are what makes this such a great place to stay and I’d like to let the Management and Ownership of this hotel know, your employees are a credit to your business. The room is clean, comfortable and quiet and the mini bar is complimentary yet topped up daily as required. The location is ideal for those who want to make the most of being in or around Chinatown, with most key places being within walking distance from the hotel. But again, a business is only as good as its people. Your staff have made me feel so welcome here and have gone over and

title: 3 nights in Singapore
desc: Loved it! We loved the location, the room could’ve been a little bigger but the bathroom was really comfortable, the staff goes out of their way to make you feel at home, they kindest staff I’ve ever had. Shout out to farriz and joselyn they were amazing. I would return 100%

title: A beautiful hotel, safe location, and exceptional service
desc: I stayed at The Scarlet for 7 nights, having come to Singapore for work. I can honestly say the team here are the kindest and most helpful of any hotel I have ever stayed at. This is an old building so it doesn't have soundproofed windows. I'm a light sleeper and was concerned about being able to sleep at the front of the building, facing the road, so had asked if it was possible to move to a quieter room. Diana on reception went above and beyond to make sure I was happy with the room I ended up in. And she was so lovely about it. Ordinarily, I think I would have felt like I was being a pain, but it just felt that they wanted me to have the best experience I could. Then on my last day, I had a very late flight so had planned to work in the lobby. There was a free meeting room

title: Heritage listed hotel bursting with heart and charm
desc: It's the team here that really make this place a five star experience even if that isn't necessarily reflected in the building itself. We understand that The Scarlet is limited in options available to the business in terms of renovating a heritage listed building which was built in the late 1800's. Expect an older building with an abundance of character and that's part of the charm....but also do be prepared for some issues with soundproofing and waterproofing in certain bathrooms, for example, especially in the rooms that have not yet been touched up. Very limited and mediocre breakfast options which are via a third party and not the hotel itself. Superbly located in the heart of Chinatown and now with Maxwell MRT station less than a minute walk away on the newly

title: Staycation
desc: Romantic and relaxing vibe unlike other commercial hotels. The receptionist is friendly and helpful. The decoration of the hotel and room is fantastic. Truly great place for couple to spend quiet time together.

title: Scarlet Singapore Stay
desc: Had a great stay at the Scarlet Singapore. Convenient location close to Chinatown shops and just across from food centre Maxwell. Rooms were neat and clean with a decent bathroom and the staff were excellent. Thanks to Jos and the team for looking after us.

title: It used to be a great hotel,disappointing!!
desc: Coming back for my 4th visit and first time since post Covid etc, I was very disappointed as this was one of my favourite places to stay in Singapore. Numerous times room keys didn’t, reply “must be de-magnetised”, never was there any apology for the inconvenience of walking a considerable distance through the dirty and run down corridors. Customer service was non existent If your travelling in business and need breakfast before 8am, forget it. The outsourced breakfast restaurant opens only from 0745. $8 tiny portion of Granola with 7-Eleven Meiji yogurt, not good enough. The room and corridor was clearly run down, water pressure was good, sleep quality was good. Almost all TV channels not working. There are a lot of good hotels in Singapore, time to make a change !!!

title: Hidden Gem
desc: This Hotel is a hidden gem. Located in Chinatown and in easy walking distance to a lot of the main attractions of Singapore; Marina Sands and Gardens by the Bay to name a couple. It also has a number of really great breakfast and dinner venues dotted around the hotel. The staff of the hotel were probably the friendliest and most welcoming we have experienced in a very long time. The open mini bar is a fantastic bonus and stocked with enough variety of soft drinks and chocolates to keep everybody happy. I would definitely recommend this hotel as a place to stay and look forward to coming back the next time I am in Singapore.

title: Excellent hotel, excellent staff and perfect location!
desc: The service from the reception staff was so welcoming and attentive. We were made to feel at home right away. The rooms are lovely and the location is perfect. Close to lots of bars and restaurants, Maxwell Food Centre just next door too. Also MRT. Very close to Chinatown. We loved our stay and we will 100% be back next time we’re in Singapore Thank you to all the lovely staff for such a pleasant stay 🙏🏼☺️

title: Proposal gone right!
desc: My girlfriend and I have always wanted to have a staycation the suites in Scarlet Hotel but could never find the time to. So I knew that I was definitely going to book a room for my proposal. Although I didn't manage to get a suite, the premium room was still pretty awesome. A big bathtub, separate shower, comfortable bed, cosy room, smart TV that was big and clear enough to watch from the bed and best of all, The Staff!!! Special mention goes out to Faizz and Joscelyn for being very accommodating especially to my requests when I was decorating the room before my girlfriend,now fiancée, reaches the room and their warm wishes. They have made our stay and most importantly, the proposal a truly wonderful experience. My fiancée has even requested that we make Scarlet Hotel our go

title: Most beautiful place to stay with the best staff ever
desc: Wow we’ve just returned from 10 nights at the Scarlet. I can honestly say the choice of the Scarlet made our holiday, from the really warm welcome to the beautiful room with the comfiest bed ever the complimentary mini bar re stocked daily we thought it couldn’t be any better but Diana Joscelyn and Faizz the reception staff were amazing the most friendly helpful hotel staff we have ever come across nothing was too much trouble from recommending places to visit to places to eat and just the welcoming smiles on your return after long hot days sightseeing. A lovely hotel in a fantastic location close to transport and good places to eat in Chinatown far better than a large corporate hotel in a tower block. We’ll definitely be back x

title: Beautiful hotel located in china town
desc: Amazing hotel, nothing like ever seen before. Wonderfully located outside of the busy areas but still close enough to where everything happens. Clean and spacious rooms. An experience that you can't find anywhere else.

title: Late night Noisy music , construction
desc: Roof top bar music thumping until midnight all weekend , including on Sunday night . Room very small , Construction outside room, pool area closed scaffolding. Won’t return or recommend Give this one a miss !

title: Impressive and enjoyable
desc: Arrived a day late after 2 sleepless nights. Checkin was quick and efficient. Shortly after my arrival i discovered my phone was missing and was sure I had left it at Changi immigration. Staff immediately helped, found the appropriate online site and filled in a lost property report for me. 3 days later, I was reunited with my phone. My stay was for 13 nights, room was fine, free mini bar was beneficial and invariably all staff inc cleaning staff were friendly and welcoming. I would certainly recommend in the highest possible way. Roderick MacDonald Scotland

title: Promises a lot but doesn’t quite deliver.
desc: The Scarlet Hotel promises so much from its website and when you walk into the hotel you feel that it is going to live up to it. First impressions are positive, the lobby is done nicely and it feels like it will be a nice boutique hotel. We booked the Executive with Balcony and first impressions of the room were disappointing. The room is much smaller than indicated in the picture and the balcony faced a multi storey car park so forget sitting on the balcony and relaxing or in fact even being able to leave the curtains open as it’s a full view into the room. The bed is comfortable and the pillows thankfully not too soft. The shower is okay… the shower head is a bit low for me (I’m 188cms) but it’s got a lot of pressure. Overall the room is nothing special - I don’t know

title: Enjoyable time
desc: We got a complimentary upgrade from staff Mr Ayub as we were checking-in. He was very warm and friendly. Mr Ayub also checked on us during our stay here. Our room we’re comfortable too. Definitely a pleasant stay for us! :)

title: wonderful
desc: my father and i stayed in the Scarlet for eleven nights in september 2022. located on erskine road on the edge of chinatown, the hotel has an excellent hawker centre,the maxwell,on its doorstep and will soon have an MRT station,Maxwell,next door.as it is,it is a very short walk to two stations on different lines. The staff in the hotel cannot be more welcoming or helpful and do all they can to ensure your stay is comfortable and hassle free;my father had lost his mobile phone on arrival at changi,nothing to do with the hotel but they couldnt do enough to help him retrieve it my room was lovely,with a vast bed,desk and chair,great en suite and plenty storage space.theres a valuables safe and a mini bar fridge which is free and replenished daily,as are snacks and coffee/tea.also

title: Highly recommend!
desc: My husband and I stayed for three nights at this delightful hotel…..having booked online as a result of reading previous reviews. The location is in Chinatown…..a lovely area to explore. And the hotel itself more than lived up to expectations! The decor is beautiful…..beds very comfortable…..walk in shower ( which I need due to arthritis), but the customer service is what sets it apart. Fiazz and his team couldn’t have been any more considerate and helpful! The complimentary bar fridge was an added surprise. You will not regret staying here, I promise!

title: Stay at hotel
desc: I love to explore Singapore even as a local. Staycation is a great way to stay in an estate and do walk about to experience. This round we stayed at The Scarlet Hotel. Had been on my lost to try. Absolutely Great experience! Front office staff were friendly and experience. Kudos to Ayub and his team. Makes our stay very welcoming even as a local. Check in was a breeze, room was beautifully furnished. Spacious balcony to chill and relax with wine compliments from the hotel. We were spoiled with whole fridge from the mini bar. Thank you we will come again

title: Cosy & Reasonable
desc: Perfectly located in the heart of Chinatown, this quaint little hotel is clean and comfortable and the staff (Thank you Thiru and all the front desk staff without exception!) are incredibly helpful. You’re also right round the corner from Club Street and some of the most iconic restaurants in Singapore!

title: You won’t regret it!
desc: My husband and I are usually the type to AirBnB but we planned a trip more last minute and found that hotel prices were somewhat comparable to homestays. We were thoroughly blown away by the hospitality and do not regret booking at the Scarlet in any way. From a twilight check in to a late checkout, the hotel was incredibly accommodating and we felt we had every creature comfort. The washroom was unimaginably clean and we had acclimation pains (ie: jet lag, coverter problems) and the hotel was perfectly situated to be a quick ride away to rest and help us if we needed anything. Fiazz and the staff were always so cheerful and incredibly kind - you won’t regret staying in such a historic building!

title: Absolutely beautiful place
desc: Fabulous hotel. Super comfortable beds. Perfectly located for Chinatown, within walking distance of all the sites and Maxwell Food Centre (one of the best food centres in Singapore) Fabulous staff - so helpful. Thank you, Faizz for making our stay!

title: The Scarlet Hotel Singapore
desc: I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the service and care I received at The Scarlet Hotel from 11 September 2022 to 12 September 2022. Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind especially FAIZZ. Me and my husband had a wonderful one night staycation with a free upgrade and complimentary wine to celebrate my husband’s 51st birthday. My husband was mesmerized by the hotel room’s interior design, and the way everything had been decorated. I have recommended The Scarlet Hotel to all of my colleagues, friends and family. I felt really comfortable during the stay, and your services are compliment worthy for sure. I am a woman who thinks that all the good things should be appreciated. Thank you again for such outstanding service. Keep

title: Head of Sales India
desc: Amazing boutique hotel.. great service and awesome room. What makes this place amazing is people who work in the Hotel like Puvan. Puvan not only helped with my luggage, made sure I don’t forget anything and gave me a coffee on way to the airport. Most go!

title: Good location, not clean at all
desc: I was supposed to stay here for 14 nights for a business trip. I left after 5 (I couldnt cancel these 5 nights). Pros: - location is great - I stayed in the premium king and the room was big Cons: - It wasn't cleaned! I had hairs both in the sink and in the towel. - Costumer service: when I told this to the front desk they only came to clean the next day and didn't think this was a big deal. - the bed was bumpy which means that your knees are really high which caused a back pain. - noisy! You hear everything- outside parties and next door rooms. I wouldn't stay here again.

title: Wonderful boutique hotel near Chinatown
desc: The front desk and housekeeping were very friendly and helpful. Near the MRT and the chinatown night markets where you can eat your heart out :) There is also a shower room if you need to freshen up after checking out, should you wish to go sightseeing before your flight Would definitely stay again!

title: Wonderful stay in China town
desc: Highly recommend the Scarlet. It's in a great quiet location in China town, right next to the Maxwell food market. Staff are very friendly and cannot do enough for you. Special thanks to Faizz who helped return our lost luggage from the airport. The rooms are very comfortable and the complimentary mini bar is a great bonus.

title: Private sanctuary on a quiet street
desc: Located on a quiet street in Chinatown, this 1920 art deco building has every amenity you would ever need. Our room was clean and neat (love those pillows and comfy king bed). Staff was very friendly and helpful navigating the sights and sounds of Singapore.

title: Great friendly hotel for staying in China Town
desc: Very enjoyable stay at The Scarlet, the staff could not do enough for you and the rooms are lovely and clean. Beds comfortable, so are the pillows and the towels nice and fluffy. Mini bar included in the room rate which was a nice bonus. Didn’t eat or drink at the hotel but it has a nice roof top bar. Umbrella and safe in the room which is always welcome. Loved staying in China town and the Scarlet was a great location, would definitely stay here again.

title: Perfect location with very helpful staff
desc: The hotel is located right across the road from the Maxwell food centre and within a few minutes walk of two other food/hawker centres so is perfectly placed to cater for any catering requirements whilst on your visit. The hotel itself is deceptively large but hidden from sight. The rooms are finished to a very good standard with complementary bar and a bottle of wine. The staff were fantastic as they helped us through a major panic on arrival with a missing passport but they quickly helped resolve the problem with a quick call to the taxi company. Highly recommended as a perfect base from which to explore.

title: Really great location if a little quirky
desc: We were a family of 5 so needed 3 separate rooms but it still worked out cheaper than almost all other central hotels in Singapore. Style/Decor - our teenage kinds loved the rather sultry decor with red corridors and suggestive messaging. Also had a great, popular rooftop bar. Location - positioned in a lovely redeveloped arcade of shops, perfect for exploring Chinatown and adjoining central areas. We were able to access hundreds of bars and restaurants within a few minutes. Only downside was some night time noise from nearby bars. Service - very friendly and efficient reception service. Rooms - quite small and a bit tired. Big difference in size of bathrooms so suggest a request for larger one. No natural light in any of the rooms we had although indirect light via hidden

title: Pleasant stay with wonderful services
desc: Amazing customer services, hotel was strategically located (near a lot of interesting restaurant and only 1 minute walk to hawkers with lots of amazing food), room was kept in pristine condition, amnesties were always refilled without asking. Overall, amazing stay and we were satisfied with our stay.

title: Wonderful stay, excellent staff
desc: Had a wonderful stay at The Scarlet Hotel. All staff were very friendly and went out of their way to help. They were able to accommodate both an early check-in and late check-out for me which really made a difference and was much appreciated. The room was very comfortable and stylish and the complimentary mini-bar and snacks were a nice touch. Hotel was reasonably priced and I would not hesitate to return on future trips to Singapore.

title: 2nd Home
desc: This hotel got 1 of the best service anyone can experience. The Staff and managers are friendly especially Faizz who always check me in. The bed is comfortable and the tv just got upgraded . Netflix is available but must put your own account. Very generous free minibar .

title: Best check in experience ever
desc: Staff Mr Faizz was very understanding and kind of the situation despite the little stress over the booking mistake I made. Regardless he remained calm and handled every bit of the situation professionally. Cheers!

title: Pleasant stay and very good customer service.
desc: Was attended by Faizz. A very very professional lad. Very efficient and swift check in. He even helped us out with some complications with our booking. Man really went an extra mile for us. Very kind and sweet. Would definitely come back for the culture here. Would give it a 10/10. 😊 (even upgraded us to the premium room) love it.

title: Amazing service at boutique hotel
desc: This is my first time to Singapore, and Faizz at the front desk made my arrival perfect at the Scarlet. Overwhelming kindness and communication made my stay at the Scarlet a place that i look forward to coming back to. Beautiful rooms in a homely environment. Highly recommend.

title: A wonderful Stay @ Scarlet..
desc: Had a wonderful Awesome Staycation Ever in this hotel with A Quadruple Thumbs Up as The Hotel Staffs : Diana,Eddie,Ayub,Faiz,Qistina,Harris,Stephanie & Nabila had done A Good Job in Their Service.The Hospitality That was provided by dem made us Feel at Home..As I celebrated my wedding day @ Scarlet the hotel teams yet surprised both me n my husband A greeting card with a decoration towels of Swan And Hearts by e towels am so amazed with that surprised given by dem...We will sure come back again..oh not forgetting my son Do really Enjoy his stay till He refused to Leave e room just imagined that as u witnessed ya own child having great fun in dat hotel..Dey even helped to lookout for my son while both my husband were bz..Thank you so much..

title: City
desc: Great service, dahianne was helpful since I came in. She provide me map of city and recommendations where to eat, shopping and convenient malls around the area They have full minibar with water soda chocolates wine coffee ofc . Is a boutique hotel in the center of the city . Beds are comfy and Netflix is included

title: Quaint, beatiful and simple with a good location!
desc: Scarlet is in an amazing location bordering Chinatown and via a secret little shortcut via Ang Siang Hill, you will reach an entire new street full of bars, restaurants and the ever famous maxwell foodcourt. The hotel itself is a collection of shop-houses housing a bakery, ice cream parlour and Italian restaurant whereby breakfast is situated. I had a free mini-bar and a bottle of wine. Diana at the check-in counter is just amazing and so is Nabila. Both are friendly and ever helpful (not to mention cheerful). The only issue i had is with room service as it never seems to arrive but it didn't matter much. If you're not looking for facilities and something boutique, clean and modern, this is your place! I look forward to visiting them again.

title: A Great Experience at Scarlet Hotel
desc: Guest relations personnel Stephanie upheld quality customer service and ensured guest welfare was attended to at all times. Highly recommended and enjoyed a great stay here at The Scarlet Hotel. Thank you.

title: Best location and staff!
desc: Faizz and Diana were very helpful with all our inquiries. Our room was super clean and we enjoyed the daily snack bar too! Everyone from the staff were friendly which made our stay stress-free and comfortable. The location of the hotel is very accessible as well! We will definitely come back here next time! :)

title: fabulous staff, fabulous hotel, fabulous location did I mention the staff
desc: Nazir, Faizz Nabila in fact all the staff could not have been more helpful and friendly they are all a true asset to The Scarlet. We booked our room 2.5yr ago and due to SOP have been unable to stay. The Scarlet honoured our booking last week and upgraded us to The Swank Suite which was super cute with a lovely balcony and very generous free mini bar. For Customer Service they cannot be beaten, imagine keeping our booking when airlines kept our flights fares,this lovely romantic getaway in a great area of Chinatown is a must to visit. Thanks again to all the amazing staff, you made our long awaited weekend extra specail.

title: amazing
desc: Located at the heart of the city and close to where the famous food centre and tourist areas can be found (Chinatown and Tanjong pagar) Room was squeaky clean, we enjoyed the minibar and complimentary snacks Customer service was excellent, Nabila and Faizz had been very helpful and kind. They made our staycation extra special! Thank you!

title: Amazed.
desc: Faizz’s service was amazing! From the moment we entered the hotel, we felt really welcome by him. Booked for deluxe room & he upgraded us to the executive balcony room. Tip top service & will definitely come back again :)

title: Best Hotel Satff
desc: Fantastic service from both Faizz and Nabila ! I got problem registering my new SIM card and both these people help me all out ! Thank you so much . Hotel is nice ! Generous mini bar . Will come back for sure . Personalise service ! Great job

title: A big hurrah for a small hotel
desc: Of all the Singapore hotels I've stayed in, big and small, the Scarlet is my favourite. Located in an old Chinatown shophouse it meanders along the rooftops of adjoining properties. Rooms are smallish, some with skylights - but you're not here for the view. Clean, comfortable, stylishly fitted, beds are big, pillows plumped, showers hot and strong. You're a few minutes from the Maxwell Street Hawker Market for your morning juices and fruit, and lunchtime chicken rice. In the evening the whole area comes alive with bars an restaurants. It's a good place, and base to explore the rest of Singapore. Scarlet's staff are upbeat, friendly, helpful. We'll be back.

title: Recommended!
desc: I stayed 2 nights in an executive room recently. It was a very comfortable and enjoyable stay. The room was nice and enough for my needs as a solo traveller, and sleep quality was good. The complimentary minibar (including a bottle of red wine!) was generous. Staff were pleasant and helpful, and allowed me an early check in by 10am without any hassle. The location of the hotel is good, next to Chinatown and a few metres away from numerous restaurants and bars. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Brief but Awesome short stay
desc: Room and toilet are very clean. Prefers brighter lit room though. Love the free complementary mini bar. Comfortable quality bed. TV has good coverage for local channels, and Netflix too! Friendly and Helpful staff. Highly recommended!

title: Great ChintaTown hotels that will get you in the mood
desc: Great rooms in a very central location (close to ChinaTown) and lots of good food places. Staff was super friendly and was able to get fulfil any request that I had, I would especially like to send my regards to "Faizz", he made my experience much more pleasant! Hotel design is just great, if you travel with your partner, they will be delighted with the red corridors that setup the mood.

title: Great service
desc: Came here with my wife on our honeymoon. Fiazz was a great front desk person and happily helped with all of our needs with a smile. Everyone else was very helpful as well. One thing, the laundry was $10 for one shirt. Pretty pricey! Nice room, great location. We really enjoyed our stay here and hope to be back at some point!

title: The beauty of a boutique hotel
desc: The staff were A1, nothing was a problem- great friendly personal service, it is lovely to return at the end of the day and be greeted by name as you pass through the foyer . In particular would like to commend Nabila on her exemplary manner and care, we were aware she worked extremely long hours and the smile never left her face- it was a pleasure to know her. The location was brilliant, so convenient to the MRT and when the Maxwell Rd MRT opens it will be a 2 minute walk, restaurants ,bars and great shopping are within a stones throw and the most delicious french bakery just below the hotel ( that will deliver pastries to your room) . The hotel is well appointed, quirky and a little bit bonkers in design, this is NOT your mainstream big international chain hotel….fortunately!

title: Tip top staycat for couple!
desc: Booked a room for a weekend staycation. Faizz, aka the friendly handsome guy, assisted us with the check in with no trouble at all. Faizz assigned us with a even greater and amusing room for the staycation which made it all worth while. All are great and truly recommended for busy couples for a short get away.

title: Great Hotel right in China Town
desc: Very cute and clean hotel right in China town. Awesome service! Only 30 min from the airport away and 10 minutes to the marina bay sand and also Singapore hanging gardens. 10/10 can recommend to friends and family

title: Fantastic stay at The Scarlet Hotel
desc: My partner and I just spent the long weekend at the Scarlet Hotel in Chinatown and it far exceeded our expectations. We loved the interior and the location was perfect. Right beside Maxwell Food Centre where we had some of the best food of our trip and close to all the main streets and bars in Chinatown. We would definitely stay again and only wish we’d had a bit more time this time! Also the staff were extremely accommodating when we asked for late check out. Overall I would highly recommend.

title: Lovely Stay
desc: We just spent 6 nights at this quirky and quaint hotel to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary. Without doubt the outstanding feature of this hotel is the staff. Every one of the hotel staff from reception, the restaurant and room service were outstanding. Extremely polite, friendly, professional and accommodating of our needs and queries. Our room was a bit small and perfectly fine for a night or two but for 6 nights with two of us it was a bit of a squeeze. We will definitely return but take a larger room next time. The air con worked well, the room was very clean and tidy and situated in a side street there was no noise. The bed was the most comfortable I've ever slept in anywhere in the world. The hotel sits in the heart of Chinatown and The Scarlet was a

title: Great stay, amazing receptionist and convenient location
desc: Front desk service was amazing. I stayed at the Scarlet hotel on a business trip and was happily greeted by Faizz, Ayud, Stephanie during the day and Puven during the night. Mini bar is always replenished and location is very convenient for first time Singapore visitors. I very much enjoyed my whole stay—the staff has good energy all around which is rare to find nowadays—will definitely come back to the Scarlet on my next visit.

title: Great Stay
desc: Front desk service was excellent. Staff accommodated our request without questions asked and we were very appreciative. It is located centrally behind Maxwell Food Centre and along the stretch of shophouse where LA Grigne Patisserie is located offering great pastries. Room is large, cozy and nicely decorated. Overall, the experience was great and we enjoyed our stay.

title: Great service from Ayub and Qistina
desc: We think good hotels can be overrated especially when staff service may be poor. But at The Scarlet Singapore, which we recently checked in at, we received top notch service from both Ayub and Qistina the moment we checked in, with a complimentary upgrade three tiers up due to a special occasion. Ayub even personally came to my room to lend me his iPhone charger.

title: Convenient stay amazing value
desc: We stayed at the scarlet and the staff were amazing. The topped the mini bar up (very well!) both nights we stayed and it was complimentary as we booked the better room so I recommend doing so. Location is amazing I will 100% stay there again. We only stoped over for 2 nights so the no pool didn’t bother us at all as the air con is really good so we were comfy. Ayub was a star and I hope he stays there till my next visit!

title: Nice quaint hotel tucked in old town SG!
desc: I'm in SG for work but want to explore the old town in my spare time. The Scarlet is the perfect spot in the middle of "old town," within walking distance of the office towers and with tons of bars, restaurants and hawker stands in the vicinity. Service is spectacular, and the decor is quaint and unique -- makes me think of nice Parisian hotels. There's definitely a bohemian vibe to this place. And on top of that it's very affordable!

title: Wonderful Experience. Highly Recommend
desc: It was great experience at The Scarlet Hotel Singapore especially the hospitality of their staff during my stay. To be specific Mr.Haziq was really kind & coordinating during my stay there. He is always ready to go extra mile to give best service.

title: Gorgeous Hotel, Amazing Customer Service
desc: Excellent hotel and customer service, would especially like to commend Ayub for the pleasant experience. Love the interior and theme of the hotel as well and great location! Bath salts and a scrubbing sponge were provided as toiletries for a comfortable bath soak. Complimentary wine for the suite room which shows they go the extra mile for guests. Overall a lovely experience and love everything about this hotel. My favourite place to book for a chill weekend. Thank you, I will definitely be back.

title: Amazing Experience
desc: Had a great stay in Scarlet Hotel. location was perfect in Ann Siang Hill. The Staff, specifically AYUB, was really friendly/helpful and welcoming. Provided us a great pleasant stay. Will definitely come back for another stay here. accidentally left my electronic device in the room, AYUB immediately called to make sure is it returned back to me as well. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: A great stay
desc: Great location in Chinatown. Quaint lowrise building om a quiet side street. Comfy beds fantastic service from the staff. Would gladly stay again on my next trip to Singapore! Looking forward to the jacuzzi!

title: Great service to come back to
desc: Situated in a quiet nook in the City Centre, the Scarlet is a delightful boutique hotel. The staff are very friendly and service-oriented and prompt to meet requests like extra bottles of water. In particular, I would single out Faiz for special kudos for his attention to detail and exceeding my expectations in his service. It didn't hurt that he has a great smile too.

title: Great experience!!
desc: Our stay at the Scarlt was much better than expected! The rooms are very clean and equipped with a good AC. The minibar is free of charge, and refilled every day! A special thank to Faizz who helped us during our stay, and planned a trip to the natural reserves!

title: Character & Charm
desc: I stayed at this property for the first time in over 5 years and was kind of shocked to find that very little had changed in that time. Firstly the positives, it oozes charm, character and is kind of funky. Location is great for the various restaurants and bars that are everywhere. If you want something different from the typical corporate style hotel that caters for business travellers, The Scarlet makes a nice change. However, its now getting quite tired, which is why I was surprised there didnt appear to be any type of recent upgrade or renovation. I stayed in one of the suites, and at over $500/night including taxes, there's just no way Id be able to justify that again. The room was relatively small with not a lot of cupboard space, although I loved having a nice balcony.

title: The Amazing Faizz!
desc: Just a quick note to acknowledge Faizz and his amazing customer service at 1am on a public holiday weekend. My girlfriend and I decided at last-minute to stay at a nearby hotel, after drinking a little too much at one of our favourite bars in the local area. Faizz had to give us sad news that The Scarlet was fully booked and were unable to accommodate us that evening. However, being The Amazing Faizz, he very kindly offered to search other local hotels that could possibly accommodate us at 1am. We eventually found one for a reasonable price and he helped secure the room with an online booking. On top of this, he also helped to book a taxi, which is an almost impossible task on the public holiday weekend. So, thank you so much again Faizz for helping a drunk couple with a

title: AMAZING SERVICE 💯
desc: They have great if not the best service, amazing location, friebdliest staff very accommodating! They made me fell in love with Singapore! Will definitely stay here again when I go back!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED 💯

title: Nice Suite
desc: The suite room was beautiful ! Room was clean and housekeeping was friendly despite many request. The check in was fast and the staff was very friendly. Thank you Faiz for taking care of us during our stay. You literally customised your service to cater to our needs. Best Service award should go to this hotel ! Good job !

title: Wondering who is Faizz??
desc: I had a birthday celebration here with my friends. Before I choose this hotel, I was looking through the reviews on TripAdvisor and notice the Staff name Faizz name mention by many guest . So we decided to call the hotel and make reservations by Faizz. We booked the Suite. Due to our busy schedule, Faizz offered to give us a video call suite tour so that we can choose the best suite. He recommended the Swank as it is his personal favourite and we went for it The room was huge and come with a separated bed room and living room. I love the balcony the most. Faizz was very helpful and even decorated the room out of good will matches to our Theme which is "Kinky" Thank you so much Scarlet Hotel for hosting us . If the hotel's owners is reading this , kindly help us to

title: Spacious ,Swanking Suite
desc: I am truly amazed and delighted upon stepping into the room with that by all the deco and the layout of the room. A friend invited us for his birthday and the hotel stuff actually took a lot of effort putting into the various decorations like mask sexy aprons and a lot of stuff. We actually had an enjoyable time at hotel and definitely looking forward to try the other rooms being offered. Would like to thank Qistina and her team for putting a lot of effort and fun decoration to the room. Thank you

title: Will visit again.
desc: Well located between maxwell mrt and Chinatown mrt. Clean and well furnished rooms. Special thanks to Qistina for going beyond to decorating the room for our birthday celebration. Another special thanks to Faizal for going the extra mile now to do a video call for the suits room, making it easier for us to find the right room best suited for our celebration. Highly recommended, will be back again soon.

title: Short leisure trip
desc: The Scarlet Hotel Singapore is lovely & Cosy special shout Out to Ayub,Eddie & Nabila along with qistina for all the help hotel staff was amazing with the help & even upgrade my room will definitely come by for the service from the staff wonderful FRONT DESK staff KUDOS to you guys.

title: Stay @ The Scarlet
desc: Just checked in & the welcoming from Ayub is so pleasant. He helped me with the bags & personally provided a small gift for my birthday to the door as I’m celebrating the stay for my belated birthday. Ayub assisted with the check in and I’m looking forward to a great stay ahead with The Scarlet. Thank you very much to the team & will definitely return again.

title: Staycation
desc: I am impressed with the Scarlett Singapore! The service is wonderful and the staff are the most friendly people i would like to compliment night shift manager Faizz he is so welcoming and friendly I would definitely recommend this hotel

title: Sexy n Chic boutique hotel
desc: Was warmly greeted with a Chill-Vibe kinnda music as I walked up to the front desk, to do the check-in, The staffs were friendly and the room had a very chic and cosy feel. All in all, a nice place for a stayca for couples.

title: Definitely Recommending!!!
desc: I am beyond impressed with the Scarlett Singapore! The service is phenomenal and the staff are some of the most friendly people I have come across! I would definitely recommend this hotel! By far one of the better hotels in Singapore. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants in the area.

title: ***** 5 stars
desc: The Scarlet Hotel is the best. The service from the moment you walk into the lobby is perfect. All the people ( the room cleaner, reception, managers etc.) who are working at the scarlet are so friendly and willing to help you with everything. I would recommend the scarlet hotel for sure if you stay in Singapore. I hope I will come back soon!

title: Highly recommended for visiting Singapore
desc: Wonderful experience at the hotel. It has been my first trip after 2 years and I had to both run errands and visit a lot of friends. The staff has been incredibly helpful and supportive. Whatever I needed they were able to accommodate my request. Location is great, walking distance to MBS and other prime spots in Singapore. Thank you for this experience after 2 years of not travelling 💖

title: Service
desc: The service in The Scarlet has been remarkable. The staff here are very friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Faiz,Nasir,Quistina,Ashley,Ayoub Do visit The Scarlet for your next trip to Singapore for your stay

title: Excellent service
desc: Had a great stay at Scarlet. Was there on a business visit and the service at the hotel was exceptional. Calling out Faiz, Nasir, Christina, Quistina, Ayoub and Ashley for being very accommodating towards our needs.

title: Amazing Service from the Heart & Wonderful Stay at The Scarlet
desc: Just had a wonderful stay with my 6 month old baby and my elderly mum. The service from Faizz, Nabila & Ashley was amazing. We arrived early at the hotel thinking to leave our luggage & walk around the area but Faizz took the initiative to check us in early, seeing that i was with a baby & helping me with the luggage to my room. It is not the easiest to move around with a baby and luggage, especially an unwell baby from his recent vaccination. Nabila always greets us with a smile & shows concern and care when we returned from a scotching day outside, even offering us cold water bottles. What a thoughtful gesture! She also gave us recommendation, Panquecas for crepes & coffee when we mentioned we were looking for a nice cafe for dessert, which was lovely. On our checkout

title: Staycation
desc: Best stay ever! Love the hotel service staff, ambience, comfort, amenities, mini bar etc. Excellent service staff! Kudos to Faizz, Diana and Eddie for the service provided ensuring I am comfortable and well taken care of. They went out of their way to help me on my booking and rooms. The location if the hotel is convenient with many places for food n sightseeing. I am already planning my next staycation in The Scarlet Hotel! Looking forward to be back! Myra

title: Amazing Stay
desc: The hotel room looks so beautiful, with my favourite bathtub! I managed to use the gym but sadly not the Jacuzzi as it was not opened due to the covid restrictions. The staff are nice, one that I remember is from Faizz who made us feel so welcomed. Looking forward to another stay if I have the chance!

title: Happy stay
desc: Wonderful service by all the front desk. Special shout out to Faizz who's so thoughful and helpful. I did not mention about my birthday this month which had passed but he took note and prepared birthday chocolates and a birthday card for me. That was really top service gesture and fully appreciated. Stay was great, hotel is clean and quiet. Fully recharged :)

Awesome awesome……… stay here long long long time ago before …. Room still look good!! Service and hardware still very good!! Nearby to some of the good food around! A good stay and would definitely try to come back when I have opportunity👍👍👍👏👏

title: Best Service!
desc: Had a great staycation made special by an AWESOME team of staff from the executive manager Ansari to the housekeeper Nawawi to the very friendly front office team Faizz. Thank you for giving the best service and a friendship to me!

title: Really Sincere and very Warm Service from Faiz
desc: I walked in to the hotel to see the actual room that I exactly want; and Faiz took his time to show me few rooms with so much patience and without hesitance! This is very rare in the hotel industry nowadays as mostly the staff are either not warm or not as genuine. We only intend to stay few hours and so we didn’t want the grand room; yet he treated me as special guest. He didn’t know this, but I’m actually a regular of their hotel. And this is why I keep coming back to this place because of their genuine hospitality. To Faiz, you’re a rare gem and keep up the good work! 🙂

title: 5-Star Excellence From Nazir
desc: I've stayed in Scarlet hotel for about a dozen times and I've always been impressed by Mr Nazir's friendliness, eagerness to help, and also his excellent attitude. He's very polite, professional and at the same time, very welcoming. He's a good example of how a frontline hotel ambassador ought to be. For example, during a stay in February, he takes his own initiative to make my girlfriend and I feel welcomed. I told him that tomorrow is my girlfriend's birthday and I left for a walk, not expecting him to do anything as we were just chatting. However, when I returned with my girlfriend, we were surprised by the birthday card and chocolates he placed by our door. It was really a pleasant surprise! I think I really owe him a good review here, he deserves it. I hope the hotel

title: My stay at the scarlett
desc: We are very pleased that the staff were able to accommodate us for our early check in and late checkout request. We had a pleasant stay and will def keep this place in mind for the future. The mini bar was for free too!

title: 11/10 service!!
desc: Had such a wonderful stay at the Scarlet — the room was clean and it was right smack in the middle of Chinatown (so lots of food options around). But what really made this stay memorable was the amazing staff at the hotel: the receptionists at the front desk were so friendly and helpful, and one by the name of Faizz even lent us his personal charger because we forgot ours (which was a real lifesaver)! Many thanks to the lovely team at Scarlet! ♥️

title: Staycay
desc: Great clean rooms with an amazing service. Forgot to bring charger for our stay and the staff lent us their own personal chargers and were really nice about it. Receptionists were very friendly and welcoming which made the stay even better. Definitely recommended.

title: Great hospitality! & loved the concept of hotel
desc: Booked Scarlet through an external travel app, but faced an issue when checking in. Throughout the whole few hours trying to resolve the issue with the app’s CS, Diana and Qistina was very helpful in assisting us to liaise with the external vendor, truly thankful for their help 🙏🏽 We are glad at the turn of events, and appreciate their help and hospitality! We enjoyed our stay at the premium room, and loved the balcony! Definitely coming back again to try the theme and passion suite ☺️

title: The scarlet hotel
desc: We went to the scarlet hotel last minutes without any reservations and been told that all the rooms are fully taken. Thank yo faizz, with a great help. Managed to get a room for us at the midnight hour. We are grateful to faizz on extension help and assistance Will be back for staycation

title: Lovely stay
desc: Front office staff, Qistina was very helpful, warm and accommodating. Check in was a breeze. My husband and I totally love the premium room. Lovely cosy setting. Complimentary mini bar was very nice. Bathtub was clean. The Scarlet is definitely worth the try for couples for some quiet time. Will definitely return!

title: Romantic Getaway
desc: It was me and my partner's first time at the hotel. We were there for valentines. Staff Qistina and Faizz were very approachable and knowledgeable. Accommodated to our queries and demands from the beginning to the end of our stay. We were blessed with the Splendor Suite. The room turned out greater than I expected, the lounge area was super comfortable, complimentary mini bar with the free selection of sparkling, red and white wine made it all better. Room also came with a bathtub and shower area. The balcony area was perfect as me and my partner had our wonderful lunch there. Such an upgrade from the initial booking I made, kudos to Qistina and Faizz! Truly a worthwhile experience!

title: Staycay Mode
desc: Friendly frontdesk, Mr Nazir and his colleague! Nice welcoming and this place is beautiful! Ive booked here three times and i am amaze by individual rooms decors. Instagram worthy! Love their comfy pillows and bed!

title: Perfect getaway!
desc: It was a wonderful stay in scarlet..When i first enter i was greeted by a friendly staff, Nazir, his service went beyond our expectation.. When i went up to the room, i was surprised to see swan towel deco & rose petals on the bed along with a card...Thanks to Faizal for the decoration..it was a surprise for me & my fiance.. We even extended our stay for one more night as one night was not enough for me to fully utilise the amenities in room..Ashley was really friendly when we are here on the 2nd day..she is definitely a star in front desk The room was amazing as it comes with a bathtub..It feels like a perfect getaway from work..I would definitely come back here again & would recommend scarlet to family & friends

title: Great place, great staff.
desc: I really liked this hotel. The staff were super friendly. They were always happy for a chat and were responsive to requests. The balcony room was a nice size and I enjoyed sitting on the balcony watching the world go by. The bed was hard as a rock though and I struggled to sleep most nights for the 9 nights I was there. In stark contrast the pillows were super soft and my head went right through them to the bed. I called for more pillows and was only allowed 2 more (my wife also wanted 2 more for the same reason and was denied). The location is excellent. It's a stone's throw from the Maxwell Hawker and the Maxwell MRT (when it opens very soon) and a short walk to the heart of Chinatown. Hard bed aside, I'd definitely stay again.

title: Hotel Stay after VTL Flight
desc: I stayed at this hotel from Dec 19 to Dec 26, 2021. I flew in on a VTL flight but had 7 days of testing to do. The hotel staff was incredibly helpful with any questions or concerns I had. Specifically, the hotel staff at the front desk named Faizz was always very helpful for any questions I had about my PCR and Art tests that I had to do, so I am grateful for his and the rest of the staff's help! With all the crazy restrictions and tests that I had to take to enter Singapore, I really appreciated this hotel for making my stay welcoming.

title: Assistant Guest Relations Manager/Beautiful Room
desc: Would like to thank Faizal for the welcome card and beautiful room set up. Faizal have been really helpful during my staycation..The room was Beautiful 😍 just wow 🤩..And i would also like to thank Ashley for helping me during my check in, she was very friendly and make me feel welcomed. Hayley was friendly and helpful when i was unable to tap my room card key and she helped me.

title: Trendy Boutique Hotel in Excellent Location
desc: I had previously hoped to stay here although circumstances didn’t allow so very pleased to experience this hotel. The staff were excellent from the moment I checked in including a pleasant upgrade to an Executive room with balcony. This included the complimentary mini bar with snacks, soft drinks and beer. Across the road from the Maxwell Hawker Street food, easy walk to the Chinatown MRT and Marina Bay etc. Special thank you to Diana (Front Office Manager) & all the staff for making my extended visit enjoyable. The hotel is quirky , being a combination of shophouses.

title: Pleasant & Comfortable.
desc: Hotel is 3 minutes walk (my pace!) to Chinatown (nearest landmark being Budhha Tooth Relic Temple and Chinatown Visitors Centre. 1 min walk to Maxwell Food Centre, a popular hawker centre in the City. So the hotel is surrounded by many nice food places. The hotel building is vintage WW2 architecture shop house type. Nice ambience with friendly staff (shoutout to the bubbly Ms Ashley!). The rooftop bar is popular with yuppies from the surrounding office buildings. We took the deluxe room with balcony. Overall, the place is quiet and felt exclusively private-like. Which is amazing considering it's on the doorstep of busy Chinatown and major offices.

title: My favourite place to stay in Singapore.
desc: Absolutely loved my stay at The Scarlet Hotel and I’m just sorry I didn’t discover it sooner. The hotel is housed in beautifully restored historic shop houses. The rooms wonderfully decorated and come with a complimentary mini bar. The surrounding area is filled with hip bars and eateries, cool architecture and is just opposite the Famous Maxwell Food Market. The staff are so friendly and helpful. A special thank you to the amazing Faiz and also Diana and Nazir for the warm hospitality. Can’t wait to return!

title: A wonderful experience at The Scarlet Hotel!
desc: My boyfriend and I went to The Scarlet Hotel on 14th Jan 2022 to celebrate his birthday. We like to give a big thanks to Haley. We were surprised by her beautiful gestures, lovely welcome, excellent services. She surprised us with an awesome room which was specially decorated with a birthday theme. The hotel sponsored a bottle of red wine, beverages and snacks. She helped us to take photos to create memorable memories. She shared with us about the hotel's Valentine's Day and Christmas promotions. That attracted us to stay The Scarlet Hotel again. It definitely worths the return visits.

title: Excellent customer service and cute hotel
desc: We were greeted by Nigel whose efficient and friendly manner made us feel even happier to arrive in Singapore. The following days we were greeted by Nazir. His warm and relaxed manner felt genuine. On our last few days Faizz was very helpful and efficient He managed our booking for an additional night.. All of you guys made it a memorable experience. Thanks again we really appreciate it. The Scarlet’s location is ideal for the Maxwell food court and buzzing China town. The Scarlet itself is on a quiet street.

title: Romantic night
desc: This is the 2nd time my husband & I disappeared from the hussel &bustle of parenting & work to reconnect in a hotel made love. A Perfect location, clean rooms, a stocked minibar and a room with a balcony is just right. The 24 reception is fantastic, and on checking in Hailey + Faizz went above and beyond with help and friendliness. I highly recommend this venue.

title: Great location and wonderful staff
desc: Stayed at The Scarlet Singapore while in Singapore for 7 nights, recently. Rooms are clean, the front desk is available 24 hours, and the location gives you immediate access to Chinatown and is within walking distance to major tourist areas. The staff, from the time we checked in to the time we checked out, was extremely helpful. Not only did they provide recommendations for adventures, routes to take, cater to our requests quickly, they also help my mother and me navigate the COVID-19-related requirements and testing. I cannot reiterate enough that the staff at the Scarlett Singapore Hotel, especially Nawauri, Faizz, Nazir, and Diana, made our time in Singapore 100X better amidst the peak COVID outbreak.

title: Feedback
desc: We checked in on 5th Jan 2022 and checked out on 6th Jan 2022. We were served by a staff name Faizz. We had one of the best customer service we could ever asked for. Faizz was extremely nice and polite, he helped us throughout our stay and made it hassle free. I would highly Recommend this Hotel for those who are looking to have a nice and private stay with their love ones.

title: Definitely repeat the stay!
desc: First of all, I would say my countdown trip in Singapore might be impossible if without the great team of The Scarlet Singapore! Starting with the first impression in contact with helpful Anasri for inquiring and making a reservation, good deal! Following with active friendly Qistina and incredible thoughtful Nazir who made everything perfect before arrival till the whole stay. Finally with fantastic Faizz who made my stay unbelievable flawless till the farewell. They literally are 6-star people!!! Nazir arranged beyond-expected Executive room with balcony, spacious terrace and clear view of Tanjong Pagar on high floor. I could say not many stay made me feel like home like this. Good layout and stylish decorations can compensate the room size. Complimentary Italian wine and

title: Well situated in Chinatown
desc: The Scarlet is well situated in Chinatown and close access to three MRT stations. Its position is also well situated for food and shopping. No where is too far in Singapore due to excellent MRT; however, some hotels such as along Orchard Road do not allow for closer cultural experiences. Apart from Chinatown itself and the Buddha Tooth Temple, there is a nearby Taoist temple and Peranakan house to explore. It is walking distance to the Marina Bay areas as well- if you like walking. The hotel is very comfortable with rooms being very clean and quiet. The open mini bar and free breakfast was a great deal and I chose an executive room; however, the cheaper rooms were quite spacious as well. Note that these rooms may or may not have a window. Bed was firm but very comfortable and

title: Warm customer service from Scarlet Singapore
desc: A pleasant stay of 5 days 4 nights in the hotel suite room. Nice and peaceful ambience inside the room with splendid design along the hallway is a great place to spend with family especially during festi season. The room is spacious as well as the toilet. My family loves the bathtub with jacuzzi. Really relaxing.. Good location within Chinatown. Restaurants and eateries are all around the corners. Helpful and friendly front desk staffs with amazing hospitality during our stay. Special compliment to Faizz who assisted us with our stay as well as resolving problem for us from the start till we checked out. Thumbs up to him.. Overall wonderful experience. Well done Scarlet's Singapore!

title: ATTN: FAIZZ & TEAM (THE SCARLET)/
desc: Would like to extend our greatest gratitude and appreciation to FAIZZ and his team at the front desk for extending their hospitality and making our stay there a memorable one. Thank you Faizz for going the extra mile and bending over backwards to ensure we felt like we were home away from home.... Keep up the good work and wishing you and your team the best of luck and a smashing new year ahead. With Appreciation, Naz Tay & Family

title: Excellent service and friendly staff
desc: I had an overnight stay at The Scarlet Hotel and I am extremely satisfied with the experience. The room was in great condition and the staff are very helpful and friendly. I was assisted by Faizz Abdul and he was very helpful for my multiple requests for taxi, local currency withdrawals and late checkout. Thank you!

title: Family staycation
desc: Hotel has a lovely ambience throughout my stay there. The interior design is aesthetically pleasing with their antique/modern style fusion. My check-in process was handled well and professionally by Qistina and Faizz at the reception. Housekeeping made my room clean when I came back after a day out. Not many hotels like The Scarlet Hotel have a complimentary minibar so I was quite pleased with what they provided, which included two KitKat bars! To the food connoisseurs, there are a number of F&B establishments around the area which includes both Halal and Non-Halal options.
